post.text:
This afternoon - I hosted a very informative national security roundtable at Trump Tower. I can assure you -- with a Trump Administration, we will make the safety & security of our nation a top priority. We will MAKE AMERICA SAFE AGAIN!
Donald J. Trump

comment.author: Kyle
comment.text: Real DonaldTrump go reach out to Kevin Jackson to help you with an African American/Black American voters! This guy is the real deal and can help tremendously!!!

replies.author: Kyle
replies.text: Everyone go like this guys page

replies.author: Edie
replies.text: Micheal Lander LOL...Trump surrogate was just on TessNN talking about how to address "the black problem." Pretty clear the campaign has conceded any idea of expanding on their base.

replies.author: Taylor
replies.text: Stop the separatist attitudes. We are all Americans first. We all have problems. Adults talk about problems to work them out. We are just getting started in heading in that direction. We are for one another and want a President that believes like we do that we have to pull together to solve our problems.

replies.author: Cheyenne
replies.text: Yeah we're going to join your party when u have people calling blacks thugs and the N word how dare ww not respond to republican values. #NeverTrump
